channel.title: Ecommerce on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Ecommerce on John Cosio

item.title: Virtual Mae
item.description: One of the projects with Dart. This involves lots of customization to themes and especially WooCommerce. The projects is an online shop but for registered members only. Since this is a niche site and shop a customized wish-list was placed to inquire about items. Built using Bootstrap, Parallax, Masonry Galleries and other design requests this is one of the bandwidth-heavy sites I’ve created. Forgot to mention that videos was used as background for home and contact pages.
